#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#define MOD 1000000007
int main()
{
	long long int t,*d,i;
	d=(long long int *)malloc(1000002*sizeof(long long int));
	d[0]=0;
    d[1]=1;
    for(i=2;i<=1000001;i++)
    	d[i]=(d[i-1]+d[i-2])%MOD; // dp
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int a,b,r;
		scanf("%lld %lld %lld",&a,&b,&r);
		if(r==1)
		{
			printf("%lld\n",a);
			continue;
		}
		else if(r==2)
		{
			printf("%lld\n",b);
			continue;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",((a*d[r-2])+(b*d[r-1]))%MOD);
	}
	free(d);
}
